pennylane-braket
================

This section contains the API documentation for the PennyLane-Braket plugin.

.. warning::

    Unless you are a PennyLane plugin developer, you likely do not need
    to use these classes and functions directly.

    See the :doc:`overview </index>` page for more
    details using the available Braket devices with PennyLane.

.. currentmodule:: braket.pennylane_plugin

.. automodapi:: braket.pennylane_plugin
    :no-heading:
    :include-all-objects:
